strong.span: To watch the live stream of the Regular Board meeting on April 20th, click here.

We have a public participation section of our board meeting. If you had something you wanted to address the board with, you can still do it remotely by emailing it to bob.indihar@isd97.org by 2:00 on Monday April 20th.
